casebody.data:
FOSTER et al.
v.
CRANDELL et al. No. 73P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 9, 2007. William J. McMahon, IV, Greensboro, for Crandell & PSIMED. Angela N. Gray, Greensboro, for Foster, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of February 2007 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of February 2007."
